test.name: TEST_DGLD_OSP_EMEA_E2E_002_GuestUser_Partial_Gift_Code_Redemption_Paypal
test.description: This test case verifies that a guest user can successfully place an order on the Osprey EMEA website using a gift code for partial payment and completing the remaining balance through PayPal.

test.name: TEST_DGLD_OSP_EMEA_E2E_003_Register_User_Partial_Gift_Code_Redemption_CC
test.description: Validate partial gift code redemption with Credit Card (CC) for a registered user on the Osprey EMEA website.

test.name: TEST_DGLD_OSP_EMEA_E2E_005_Full_GiftCode_Redemption_MultipleItem_MultipleQty
test.description: Validate full gift code redemption for a multiple-item, multiple-quantity order on the Osprey EMEA website

test.name: TEST_DGLD_OSP_EMEA_E2E_008_Admin_Register_User_dicount_gift_Card_Redeem_CC
test.description: Validate discount and gift card redemption by an admin-registered user, with the remaining balance paid via Credit Card (CC) on the Osprey EMEA website.

test.name: TEST_GOLD_OSP_EMEA_E2E_NW_009_GuestUser_Checkout_With_Discount_Paypal_Payment
test.description: Validate guest user checkout using a discount and completing payment via PayPal

test.name: TEST_DGOLD_OSP_EMEA_NW_E2E_010_GuestUser_Checkout_With_Partial_GiftCode_Redemption
test.description: Validate guest user checkout with partial gift code redemption, paying the remaining balance through another payment method on the Osprey EMEA website

test.name: TEST_DGLD_OSP_EMEA_E2E_EU_DE_011_RegularItems_MultipleQty_Discount_PayPal
test.description: Validate checkout for regular items with multiple quantities, applying a discount, and completing payment via PayPal on the Osprey EMEA website (EU/DE region).

test.name: TEST_GOLD_OSP_EMEA_E2E_EU_EN_012_Two_Items_Qty2_PartialGC_Redeem_CC
test.description: Validate checkout for two items with quantity 2, using partial gift code redemption, and paying the remaining balance via Credit Card (CC) on the Osprey EMEA website (EU/EN region).

test.name: TEST_GOLD_OSP_EMEA_E2E_SW_013_GuestUser_Checkout_With_Discount_Paypal_Payment2
test.description: Validate guest user checkout with a discount and payment via PayPal on the Osprey EMEA website (SW region)

test.name: TEST_GOLD_OSP_EMEA_E2E_SW_014_Multiple_Items_Multiple_Qty_PartialGC_Redeem_CC2
test.description: Validate checkout for multiple items with multiple quantities, using partial gift code redemption, and paying the remaining balance via Credit Card (CC) on the Osprey EMEA website (SW region)

test.name: TEST_DGLD_OSP_DEN_E2E_015_Register_user_checkout_with_Multiple_Products_Discount_CC
test.description: Validate registered user checkout with multiple products, applying a discount, and completing payment via Credit Card (CC) on the Osprey DEN website

test.name: TEST_DGLD_OSP_DEN_E2E_016_Regular_3items_Multiple_QTYs_PartialGiftCode_Redemption_PayPal
test.description: Validate checkout for three regular items with multiple quantities, using partial gift code redemption, and paying the remaining balance via PayPal on the Osprey DEN website

test.name: TEST_GOLD_OSP_EMEA_E2E_CHE_DE_17_GuestUser_PartialGift_Code_Redemption_CC
test.description: Validate guest user checkout with partial gift code redemption, paying the remaining balance via Credit Card (CC) on the Osprey EMEA website (CHE/DE region)

test.name: TEST_DGLD_OSP_CHE_FR_E2E_018_Guest_User_Multiple_Item_Full_Gift_code_Redeem_with_Multiple_QTY
test.description: Validate guest user checkout for multiple items with multiple quantities, using full gift code redemption on the Osprey CHE/FR website

test.name: TEST_DGLD_OSP_CHE_IT_E2E_019_Register_User__Multiple_items_and_qty_with_GC_and_Discount_CC
test.description: Validate registered user checkout for multiple items with multiple quantities, applying gift code redemption and a discount, with the remaining balance paid via Credit Card (CC) on the Osprey CHE/IT website
